description: Update a record for a given model by fetching a JSON value from the JSON input
label: Update Record From JSON Input

options.name: selectedRecord
options.label: Record
options.info: The record you want to update.

options.name: jsonInput
options.label: JSON Input
options.info: The JSON text you want to fetch from in to one or more properties.

options.name: mapping
options.label: Value Mapping
options.info: Mapping of values/JSON values to properties for the updated record. The properties are based on the model from the selected record. JSON values can be fetched from the JSON input by using dots as separater (for example 'result.id').

options.name: as
options.label: As
options.info: The name of the variable you want for the updated record.
